name: The dollmaker (itch)
description:
Controls

MovementWASDInteractEPause / ResumeESCTo put away lettersTAB"Run" (to walk faster) holdSHIFT

Short story: Glan Hall (the protagonist) after not receiving feedback from his brother, decided to visit the hotel where he should have been.

Tools used : Unity --- Visual Studio --- Photoshop --- Adobe XD --- Blender --- Substance Painter.

Assets used :

 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/horror-environmen...

https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/character/other/fully-rigged-doll  (Re rigged)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/dark-complete-horror-ui-200569

Short backstory: In the first 2days of the jam I tried to find a team but I got rejected 2 times because I had no portfolio to show because this is my first game jam :/. So I started it alone but got some help from an audio designer: 

Daniel J Owens [AffordableNature] : https://soundcloud.com/affordablenature

I had to cut off some rooms/parts of the game because I had no time to finish them due to some RL stuff, but I enjoyed this game jam (: (especially for the horror theme)
